title: man this new udyr skin lookin' fine

embed.description: The Internet's visual storytelling community. Explore, share, and discuss the best visual stories the Internet has to offer.

body:
so i was playing an aram game as udyr and uh

let's just say at first i was whining because i got udyr in aram

and then i was dying laughing thank you for this riot

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're currently working on a fix. In the meantime, we've disabled Primal Udyr and SGU.
Ummm...I just had an ARAM game against a classic orianna, and the same thing happen to her.

> [{quoted}](name=lightdragoon88,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=x2JmwYoL,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-01-29T19:29:20.635+0000)
>
> Ummm...I just had an ARAM game against a classic orianna, and the same thing happen to her.

Thanks for the heads up, we'll check it out.
+1, Was happening with classic ori for me too, on aram.
Alot of people reporting this even on reddit: http://youtu.be/k3bLHJQ6QPI
How. How did this even happen.
This looks more to me of a video card artifacting issue.
best skin since that bug-eyed PBE mundo a couple weeks back
